entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
